titleStmt.title: Iests to make you merie with the coniuring vp of Cock VVatt, (the walking spirit of Newgate) to tell tales. Vnto which is added, the miserie of a prison, and a prisoner. And a paradox in praise of serieants. Written by T.D. and George Wilkins.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
Wilkins, George, fl. 1607. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: By N[icholas] O[kes] for Nathaniell Butter, dwelling neere to St. Austins Gate, at the signe of the pide Bull,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: to St. Austins Gate, at the signe of the pide Bull
